content:
Common actions with assets - Developer
Skip to content
Examples of common actions with assets
Â¶
In this section you'll find examples of the most common actions dealing with
assets
. All assets share a common set of attributes and relationships: such as certificates, announcements, term assignments, classifications, custom metadata, READMEs, and more.
These common examples cover interacting with those common attributes and relationships â€” focusing primarily on enriching assets that already exist.
Each page includes variations on the topic they cover:
Certify assets
Manage announcements
Change description
Change owners
Classify assets
Change custom metadata
Link terms to assets
Manage asset READMEs
Add asset links
